page.syntax: Object_List as C = BROWSE_OBJECTS_GET(C Browsename[,C library[,C prefix[,C classprefix]])

argument.name: Browsename
argument.description: The name of a saved browse layout. Character

page.description: Returns object hierarchy for a browse.
page.discussion: The BROWSE_OBJECTS_GET() function returns a list of the columns on a browse layout.
page.example: ? browse_objects_get("CustomerBrowse") = Customer Id Last Name First Name Company Phone Number Fax Number
